summary: 1 in 4 U.S. adults reports having a disability. We reported that the Department of Health and Human Services could do more to ensure health care is accessible to people with disabilities. This is an "Easy Read" version of our report. Easy Read is a way some groups make their written information easier to understand. For example, Easy Read documents use short sentences and plain...
title: SUPPLEMENTAL MATERIAL FOR GAO-26-107120: Health Care Accessibility: Further Efforts Needed to Address Barriers for People with Disabilities
